Objective: Make a Working Carrier that can float on water, then land a plane on it. Only b9 aerospace modpack is allowed.(optional)

Rules:

-The plane can have VTOL/STOL capabilities

-The carrier must be able to travel on sea

-B9 aerospace pack can be used(optional)

Helpful suggestions:

-Arresting hook

Make a normal plane. Then attach a landing gear, protruding out of the plane. Assign the brakes of the gear to a hotkey. Upon touchdown, press the hotkey and the gear will act as a arresting hook to slow the plane down.

-Harrier

Using B9 turning engines, you can make a harrier version of a plane. Simply land vertically, and the challenge is completed.

-Carrier transport

Attach long metal gurders to the bottom of the carrier, then attach gears at the end. This will allow easy transport to sea and will also keep the carrier buoyant.

good luck!
